GIF

entry.title: DefinedLook‚Ñ¢ V Line Face Lifting Belt
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 255.58

Product Description:

A v-shaped face is a dream of many, especially in Asia. However, not all are blessed to have a v-shaped visage. If you are one of those who want to get off their double chin and achieve a perfect v-shaped face, our DefinedLook‚Ñ¢ V Line Face Lifting Belt!

2 PHOTON MODES: This revolutionary beauty tool uses 2 lights for comprehensive skin care. Blue light for acne removal and red light to flat wrinkled skin.

BEST V-FACE SHAPE RESULT: This tool can effectively fix the face contours, thus giving you a smaller, smoother, and softer look.

TIGHTENED SKIN & YOUNGER LOOK: Since the skin gets sag as we age, this genius beauty device can help tighten your skin and make you look younger than your actual age. It produces 3,500 high-frequency vibrations per minute to lift and tighten the skin.¬†

MOISTURIZED & WRINKLE-FREE SKIN: In addition to tightening the skin, the use of this V line face lifting belt can make your skin moisturized and can lose all your wrinkles.

SMART DESIGN: This face lifting belt has an ergonomic design that fits all face shapes, and has an adjustable headband.

USER-FRIENDLY: It uses skin-friendly material that is safe and irritant-free. Not to mention that it is also simple and convenient to use, thus you can slim your face whenever and wherever you want

How to Use:¬†

Step 1: Wipe the massager head with a wet towel. Adjust the tightness of the bandage and completely attach the face lifting belt to the face. *Adjust the massage intensity from low to high.
Step 2: After starting the product, the default working time is 10 minutes. The product will automatically shut down after. Turn it on again if you want to extend the usage time.

Friendly Tip:

Recommended to use no more than 15 minutes each time.

entry.title: RainbowGlow‚Ñ¢ LED Therapy Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 145.99

Product Description:

RainbowGlow‚Ñ¢ LED Therapy Mask uses cutting-edge LED technology used by dermatologists and estheticians all around the globe to treat breakouts, inflammation, and other facial problems! It can magnificently bring spa quality-like treatment at the comfort of your home!

¬†

Stimulates Skin Cell's Healing Capacity

This mask deeply penetrates your skin facial tissue and stimulates the skin cell's healing capacity for a clearer and firmer look.

Detoxifies Skin

It greatly detoxifies your skin by powering up the mitochondria using phototherapy

Eliminates Mites Living on Face

RainbowGlow‚Ñ¢ LED Therapy Mask even guards your skin against harmful Demodex mites which can cause skin problems such as scaly skin and eczema!

Stimulates Collagen and Elastin Production

Its cell-metabolism properties help the skin to build more collagen and elastin, improve pesky spider veins, and make your skin subtle and flawlessly smooth!

Pore Minimizers and Acne Remover

The Blue Light emitted by this mask is ideal in minimizing your pores and eliminates propionibacterium acnes!

ALL-in-ONE Device

  • Eliminates Wrinkles
  • Improve Saggy skin
  • Alleviate allergies
  • Treat Sunburns
  • Minimizes Pores and Oily skin
  • Radiant Complexion

Affordable LED Light Therapy to Enjoy at HOME

More and more spas are now switching to LED Light Therapy. They roughly charge between $250 to $300 PER SESSION. Using RainbowGlow‚Ñ¢ LED Therapy Mask¬†you can save more and still enjoy ALL the benefits a normal spa can give!

100% SAFE and EFFECTIVE

RainbowGlow‚Ñ¢ LED Therapy Mask is engineered to comfortably secure your face and neck without causing any harm to your well-being

How do Colours Work?

RED LIGHT

Collagen and elastin production, anti-inflammatory, tighten loose skin, increases elasticity, improve blood circulation

BLUE LIGHT

Minimize pores, regulate sebum production, eliminate pesky acne

GREEN LIGHT

Brighter complexion, eliminate age spots, relieves mental stress, balances oil in the skin

YELLOW LIGHT

Treat sunburns, swelling, and redness

PURPLE LIGHT

Anti-aging, reduce fine lines and wrinkles, sterilize acne-producing bacteria

CYAN LIGHT

Soothes allergies, reduce swollen capillaries, enhances cell energy

WHITE LIGHT

Reduce fine lines and sagging

ADVANCE TECHNOLOGY

  • This mask uses natural light waves transmitted by 150 high-intensity LED lights that deeply penetrate your skin facial tissue and stimulates the skin cell's healing capacity

¬†

  • It is also fully equipped with detachable microcurrent electrodes that emit low-voltage electrical currents repairing damaged skin!

  • It even comes with a built-in silicone eye-protector that minimizes the light that shines through the eyes. Yes, this means you can open your eyes once the mask is already on your face!

How to use in 4 EASY STEPS?


REAL PEOPLE. REAL RESULTS

Amanda W.

Verified Buyer

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

My dermatologist indicated that my next step in dealing with my rosacea was laser treatments. This was a rather expensive method and my heart sunk so I searched for a foundation that would give me the illusion of the face I wanted. Of course, it works well since it gives a look that my skin is flawless. However, the only downside was that it was irritating to my skin causing more acne problems which were an additional burden to my skincare routine journey! But thankfully, I found RainbowGlow! Before purchasing this, I first read the reviews and studied its features well. During the first week, I was using it 3x with 3 colors. If you asked me if my rosacea is gone? Well, my skin texture is visibly changing for the better! Redness is gone! That‚Äôs 15 minutes total and my skincare products seem to absorb and work better. Now, I‚Äôve been using it for 2 months already. My face looks younger and my pores minimized. I‚Äôm glad to take a chance on this product! This literally brings back the colors of my life ‚Äì confidence and attractiveness in one!

Lauren, G.

Verified Buyer

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

It has been about a month since I started using the mask. My skin has been badly breaking out for a few months and my rosacea symptoms got worse too during this time. It was driving me crazy! However, in less than a month I saw a drastic improvement. I have noticed several improvements in my 30-year-old skin already. I use the white light for 10 minutes to penetrate deep and ‚Äúwake up‚Äù my skin then use the red and blue lights for 10 minutes each, all at level 5. My acne rosacea is slightly better. A small stubborn patch of eczema has disappeared. The large pores on my cheeks are shrinking and my skin tone seems more even. I once used the mask after using my personal micro-derm exfoliator and my skin is still super smooth several days later. I'm so happy. I'm crediting it to the mask. I can't wait to see what results I'll get as I continue using it.


¬†

Let's Get Straight to the FAQs!

Do LED Light Therapy SCIENTIFICALLY PROVEN?

YES. In fact, it has been validated, tested, and proven by hundreds of Medical Laboratories and Universities across the globe including NASA.¬†

Can I use other skincare products while using the mask?

You can still use your favorite cosmetics and other skincare regimes while using the mask, however, we highly suggest using them AFTER using the mask to allow your skin to fully absorb the benefits of the mask.

Is it painful to wear?

ABSO-POSITIVELY NO! RainbowGlow‚Ñ¢ LED Therapy Mask¬†is completely painless and even comes with a calming effect on your skin and mental health!

Can the LED Lights damage my eyes?

Others may be, but never RainbowGlow‚Ñ¢ LED Therapy Mask! This mask is made with built-in silicone eye-protectors to minimize the light that shines to the eyes.

How long and how many times should I use it?

You can use it 3-7 times a week for 10-20 minutes per treatment. Moreso, if you're new to this product, you may start your treatment three times a week for 5 minutes using different colors during each treatment.

Should I need to be totally still while using it?

Heck, NO! You are free to read or watch while wearing it!

Is it SAFE?

RainbowGlow‚Ñ¢ LED Therapy Mask is 100% SAFE and UV-FREE. It is engineered to comfortably secure your face and neck without causing any harm to your wellbeing

What's another "BEST" thing about this mask?

IT'S CRUELTY-FREE!!! There's no single animal harm during the making of this product.

Specifications:

Colour: White

Facial Mask Weight: 0.3 kg

Neck Mask Weight: 0.1 kg

Number of LEDs: 102 LEDs (Facial Mask); 40 LEDs (Neck Mask)

Voltage: 110V - 220V , 60Hz/50Hz

Includes:

1 x LED Face Mask

1 x Remote Control

1 x User Manual

entry.title: ToneUp‚Ñ¢ Ultrasonic Skin Cleanser
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 65.99

Product Description:


Struggling with skin impurities, like acne, white/blackheads, and the like? Well, you are not alone. As a matter of fact, many around 80% of adolescents and young adults are dealing with acne. Aside from speaking with a doctor or dermatologist, there's another way to free your face from impurities ‚Äî ToneUp‚Ñ¢ Ultrasonic Skin Cleanser!

ToneUp‚Ñ¢ Ultrasonic Skin Cleanser¬†is a rechargeable skin spatula that produces 30,000Hz ultrasonic vibration to deeply clean pores. Thus, make your skin fine, smooth, glowing, and free from such impurities.

With this revolutionary beauty facial tool, you can have a soothing facial experience even without leaving the comfort of your home! ToneUp‚Ñ¢ Ultrasonic SSkin Cleanser¬†uses EMS technology to activate and uplift your skin. It also combines two skincare treatments: deep cleanse treatment, which uses continuous waves to remove dead skin cells and sonophoresis treatment that uses pulsing waves to increase the permeability of your skin to help your skincare serum penetrate your skin more deeply.

With regular use, ToneUp‚Ñ¢ Ultrasonic Skin Cleanser¬†can help you solve your skin issues, including clogged pores, blackheads and whiteheads, excess oil, dry, flaky skin, dull skin tone, and more. Not to mention that this revolutionary face tool is:

  • Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
  • Promotes blood circulation inside the dermis
  • Restores skin elasticity
  • Suitable for sensitive skin
  • Easy to operate
  • Can be charged anytime and anywhere
  • Portable

How to Use:

Step 1: Apply warm water to your face.¬†

Step 2: Turn the device on by pressing the power button. Select your preferred intensity (low or high).

Step 3: Saturate a piece of cotton wool and hold the device (the control panel must be away from your face). Then hold the device and gently scrape on your face.

Step 4: After use, turn the device off by pressing the power button. Clean the blade by wiping with a damp cloth. Store with a protective sleeve on the blade.

*If left on, the device will automatically turn off after 10 minutes.

*For best results, use after bathing or showering. We recommend 2 to 3 treatments a week.

Specifications:

Material: ABS

Item Type: EMS Lifting and Skin Scrubber

Voltage: DC 5V

Power: 3W

Item Size: Approx.¬† 17.5 cm* 4.9cm * 2cm / 6.9in * 1.9in * 0.8in

Include:

1 x Ultrasonic Facial Skin Scrubber

1 x USB Line

1 x User Manual¬†

Note:

  • Wipe the blade (shovel head) with a cloth with little alcohol before and after use.
  • Do not stay the device on the skin for more than 3 seconds (gently move it on the skin surface).

As we age, our skin ages too. No one can simply stop aging but we can delay it and even conceal it perfectly using this revolutionary gold pulse roller! No need for painful surgeries, no more money wasted on expensive skincare products, just promising contour, and lifting glow!

GlowContour‚Ñ¢ 24k Gold Slimming Pulse Roller vibrates 6000 times a minute! Its micro-vibration provides the right amount of stimulation our skin needs to improve its elasticity reducing the formation of wrinkles around the eyes, lips, forehead, and neck!

This slimming pulse roller activates skin cells through the gold ions found in it, thus, providing radiance and elasticity to the skin!

It also promotes blood circulation and restores the firmness of the skin reducing frown lines and wrinkles, while lifting tired eyes, crow's feet and puffy eyes!

GlowContour‚Ñ¢ 24k Gold Slimming Pulse Roller T-shaped carefully sculpts face providing you the instant contour you need! Just massage it around the saggy areas you wish to improve on your visage repeatedly to witness its instant lift!

How to Use:

GlowContour‚Ñ¢ 24k Gold Slimming Pulse Roller is very easy to maneuver!¬†

To relax facial muscles and improve skin's fatigue, roll the roller upward from your chin going to your cheeks, then slide it sideward from the bottom of your eyes and lastly, roll it going sideward on your forehead.

For face slimming, roll it on your face starting from your neck to your jawline going to your chin then cheeks and forehead.

Do this for 3 to 5 minutes every day.

entry.summary:

As we age, our skin gets prone to wrinkles as it loses its elasticity, which is why many are considering getting a facial every once in a while. But the problem is not all have time and/or money to sustain their pampering needs. Fortunately, PrettyCure‚Ñ¢ Rose Quartz & Jade Stone Facial Roller comes to the rescue!¬†

This beauty tool is made from 100% natural Jade stone (which is believed to attract luck and opportunity, and is known to help reduce stress) and rose quartz (corresponds to the heart chakra, the energy center of love) soldered with silver nickel, can be used for the betterment of your skin and health.

With PrettyCure‚Ñ¢ Rose Quartz & Jade Stone Facial Roller, you can be able to give yourself a good pampering without having to leave the comfort of your home, given that it gives amazing anti-aging benefits like refining pores, diminishing fine lines, toning and tightening the facial muscles, improving skin elasticity, and more.¬†

By using it on a regular basis, your puffiness, dark circles, and bloating will diminish. It also promotes blood circulation and improves lymphatic drainage. In addition, PrettyCure‚Ñ¢ Rose Quartz & Jade Stone Facial Roller also has other benefits to offer, like:

  • Stimulate collagen production
  • Sinus relief ‚Äî prevents terrible headaches
  • Help drain lymphatic fluids and toxins

How to Use (Facial Roller):

Step 1: Wash your face with normal cleansing products.

Step 2: Apply any night creams to your face and neck.

Step 3: Use the roller in upward motions over your forehead, cheeks, around the lip area and neck. Close your eyes and roll gently over your eyelids if you have puffy eyes or bags under your eyes.

Step 4: Use the roller on your face and neck for 5 to 10 minutes.

Step 5: Use the roller three times a week to reduce lines and wrinkles.

Step 6: Clean your facial roller according to instruction.

How to Use (Gua Sha Stone):

¬†

Step 1: Hold the gua sha tool with the curved side to your face.

Step 2: Gently glide it up and out, starting with the neck, jawline, chin, and around the mouth.

entry.title: AL'IVER Mineral-Rich Magnetic Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 35.99

Product Description:

There's a new fun way to keep your skin looking fresh and young! Introducing the revolutionary AL'IVER Mineral-Rich Magnetic Mask, a cleaning mask that will lure minerals into your skin!

Many anti-aging products have roots in similar methods of using magnets like the AL'IVER Mineral-Rich Magnetic Mask!

This revolutionary face mask combines traditional face mask ingredients along with iron particles creating micro-current that can be enhanced using a magnet to help the skin's ability to heal itself and restores the natural anti-aging cells of our skin!

When you remove the mask using the magnet, it extracts the impurities leaving your face cleaner, smoother, more vibrant, healthier, and young-looking!

The mask is made up of minerals such as iron, magnesium, and zinc that deeply penetrates the skin and pores to remove dirt residue!

If you want to give yourself the ultimate cleaning facial mask that you can enjoy applying and removing while giving you multiple benefits, this is the best choice for you!


How to Use:

Here‚Äôs how you can enjoy every bits and piece of AL‚ÄôIVER Mineral-Rich Magnetic Mask!

Step 1: Clean your face, make sure to remove any makeup residue for your skin to fully absorb the mask.

¬†Step 2: Cover your face with the mask using the spatula and wait for 10 minutes.

Step 3: Cover the magnet with plastic or a piece of cloth.

¬†Step 4: Slowly remove the mask by moving the magnetic cleaner on your face with 0.5 cm distance from your skin!

¬†Step 5: After removing all the mask, pat your face using your clean hands for your skin to completely absorb the essence.

¬†

entry.title: IntenseGlow‚Ñ¢ Electric Blackhead Remover

Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:

Product Description:

Aside from pimples and whiteheads, another impurity that can appear on the skin, commonly on the face area, of most people are blackheads. These are small dark or black bumps that appear on your skin due to clogged hair follicles. Whether you admit it or not, removing blackheads is quite challenging, but not when you have the right tool ‚Äî IntenseGlow‚Ñ¢ Electric Blackhead Remover!

Given that this revolutionary blackhead remover is made from high-quality ABS material, rest assured that it can completely remove blackheads without causing harm to your skin.

¬†

IntenseGlow‚Ñ¢ Electric Blackhead Remover has four (4) functional heads and up to five (5) levels of adjustable suction which can be used to remove blackhead, acne, and to deeply clean the face.

Diamond Head:

Scrubs and exfoliates the dead skin and suck it out. Can be used on any area on face except the area around the eyes.

Big Circular Hole Head:

Removes blackheads effectively. Use in any area on face except around the eyes.

Small Circular Hole Head:

Can be used to remove blackhead at the sensitive area, like the area around the eyes.

Oval Hole Head:¬†

Firms the skin, removes wrinkles and increases skin elasticity. Can be used on area around the eyes, corner of the mouth and other areas that are prone to fine lines.

Unlike the traditional blackhead remover, IntenseGlow‚Ñ¢ Electric Blackhead Remover is rich in multi-vitamins and protein, that protect skin from being hurt by the strong suction power.

¬†

  • Designed for easy and comfortable use
  • Removes wrinkles on your face

  • Increases blood circulation in the skin
  • Convenient to use
  • Lightweight and portable

¬†

    Step 2: Move the blackhead removal device gently across the top, the suction cup will remove the surface blackheads automatically.

    Specifications:

    Battery Capacity: 850mAh
